short_summary: Minimally processed meat and poultry products and Fish
description: The Department of National Defence(DND), Correctional Service of Canada(CSC), and Department of Fisheries and Oceans(DFO) are looking for a qualified contractor to provide Minimally processed meat and poultry products and Fish. The Standing Offer will be used to achieve this objective by an authorized representative.

full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement EC095-240005: RMSO Meat, Fish, Poultry**
==============================================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Reference Number:** WS4479738170-Doc4495699825
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4479738170
*   **Publication Date:** March 27, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 18, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Amendment Date:** March 29, 2024

**Project Description**
---------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for minimally processed meat and poultry products, and fish.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

Bidder will be required to provide a standing offer for the provision of minimally processed meat and poultry products and fish for government departments and agencies.

**Bidder Eligibility**
--------------------

To be eligible, the bidder must be a valid Supplier or Contractor that meets the necessary qualification and registration requirements, and must not be in category "other" when using the Ariba Technology in Canada platform (TPS).

**Regions of Delivery**
--------------------

The scope of work will include delivery to the following regions in Atlantic Canada:

*   New Brunswick
*   Nova Scotia
*   Newfoundland and Labrador

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
------------------------------

This RFSO is subject to competitive examination. The bids will be evaluated on the basis of the lowest price, all other factors being equal. Trade agreements may be applied in this solicitation.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

Canada is committed to promoting international trade and requires that all "Schedule B" goods, mineral products, and goods of Canada be provided on a Most-Favored-Nation (MFN) tariff.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

To obtain additional information and/or the solicitation documents, please contact:

Tara Sheppard (SPAC/PSPC)
Senior Contracting Officer (T)
tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
[phone number will be inserted] (to be confirmed)

You can view the complete entry on the [discovery.ariba.com](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19232129?extsite=MTkyMzIxMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) page. Please note
